channel.title: Jo McFarlane on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Jo McFarlane on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Jo McFarlane's journey to recovery
item.description: JM - Jo McFarlane Building the future: shaping our social work identity newly qualified social worker conference was held on 31 May 2018 in Edinburgh. Delivered with the University of Edinburgh (in partnership with the Higher Education Heads of Social Work Group), Iriss, Scottish Social Services Council, the Scottish Association of Social Workers, Social Work Scotland and the Scottish Government, it provided an opportunity for newly qualified social workers to come together to connect and reconnect.
